Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.19.Dengue"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.19.Dengue

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.19.Dengue

title: IMMZ.DT.19.Dengue

status: draft

date: 2023-04-13 07:36:12+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Dengue vaccine between 9 and 45 years of age

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT19

action

title: Immunize Patient for Dengue - No Doses at 9 years old

description: Provide Dengue immunizations – using the "Dengue vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Dengue vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Dengue because no doses at 9 years old in a 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 9text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Dengue because no doses at 9 years old in a 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" <= 45text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Dengue because no doses at 9 years old in a 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pregnancy Status" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Dengue because no doses at 9 years old in a 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Individual is Seronegative for Dengue" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient for Dengue because no doses at 9 years old in a 3 dose scheme
